channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- crypto/tls
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- crypto/tls

item.title: CVE-2023-39322|2024-09-26T15:56:13.357Z -- go%20standard%20library -- crypto%2Ftls
item.description: QUIC connections do not set an upper bound on the amount of data buffered when reading post-handshake messages, allowing a malicious QUIC connection to cause unbounded memory growth. With fix, connections now consistently reject messages larger than 65KiB in size.
